Dear Harry:
Your financial report seems to be quite adequate in every
respect except the matter of certification. We -would like to
have a copy certified to by your chief financial officer.
I am assuming that,since you indicate your 1960-61 budget
total is $36^800, you are not planning any changes in next yearâ€™s
budget.
I hope that we will have this certified financial report and
a copy of your program report within the next week or two, since
we want to make this payment during the month of August.
Sincerely and with best wishes^
7n-
Maurice F. Seay
